law.catch_line: A partner may not with fraudulent intent:...

text.section:
A partner may not with fraudulent intent:
convert or appropriate to the partner's own use partnership money or property;
make, or cause to be made, a false entry in partnership records of a partnership transaction; or
fail to make or cause to be made an entry in partnership records to show the true state of a transaction:
relating to partnership business; or
involving the use of partnership money or property.
A person who violates this section is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to imprisonment not exceeding 10 years or a fine not exceeding $5,000 or both.
A person who violates this section is subject to § 5-106(b) of the Courts Article.
